summary: A beautiful, historical film based upon the complex lives of four brothers.
cast: Tony Chiu-Wai Leung|Shu-Fen Hsin|Sung Young Chen|Jack Kao|Wou Yi Fang|Ai-Yun Ho|Chien-Ho Huang|Chien-ru Huang|Chi-Ying Kao|Tien-Lu Li|Ju Lin|Lih-Ching Lin|Ching Lu|Ikuyo Nakamura|Chen-Nan Tsai|Chang-Chiang Yang
title: Ciudad doliente
